songs.title: The Answer
songs.lyrics:
Verse 1

So much things I have in mind
I need an answer but I can't find
All these places I wanna go
All these feelings I can't show

Refrain

Why did I let you in my mind ?
All of these answers I can't find, so much feelings deep inside
I know it's hard to understand
But this is just the way I am

Verse 2

When all the lights are going out
I know that I can't be without
Something's missing yea I know
The only anwer I get is no

Bridge

I'm searching for the answer
I'm searching for so long
I'm searching for the answer
But it's YOU, it's YOU

Refrain

Why did I let you in my mind ?
All of these answers I can't find, so much feelings deep inside
I know it's hard to understand
But this is just the way I am
